Review Comment: Calidad del equipo bastante aceptable, características de pantalla y cámara muy buenas, el SO Android es una versión adaptada a Xiaomi lo cual ofrece características adicionales de configuración, el sonido de primera, con volumen alto no hay distorsión al uso de la bocina, considero la relación Calidad - Funcionalidad / precio bastante aceptable, el envío llegó al día siguiente, cabe mencionar que venía bien empacado, con la caja sellada y todos los accesorios incluyendo el adaptador para el toma corriente.

Review Title: El celular ya estaba usado, tenía fotos almacenadas y la caja del celular no tenía sellos.
Review Comment: Me dio desconfianza ver que el celular ya estaba usado, tenía fotografías almacenadas, además era un regalo muy importante, lo tuve que devolver.

Review Title: customer, misrepresenting and diluting the claimed grievances with lapse of time
Review Comment:
In relation to defrauding the customer, misrepresenting and diluting the claimed grievances with lapse of time.
  I was purchased 03/02/2023 on Amazon online store MI Xiaomi 12 Pro | 5G (Noir Black, 12GB RAM, 256GB Storage) | Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 | 50+50+50MP Flagship Cameras (OIS) | 10bit 2K+ Curved AMOLED Display | Sound by Harman Kardon | I bought a mobile phone B09XB8RRMV ( XI12PRO-BLK-12+256GB ) for Rupees ₹ 59,999.00 (Fifty Nine Thousand Nine Hundred Nine Hundred Nine ) on monthly instalments. From the 58th day of purchase of the mobile phone, various technical glitches occurred. In this regard, while using the mobile phone in their service centre, series of technical problems occurred. Due to continuous repair and their company was unable to fix it, they were given a replace mobile phone with a New IMEI number. However, for the past one year, there have been various series of technical glitches and problems while using their mobile phones. Xiaomi 12 Pro | Due to the series of technical glitches since they started using the 5G phone, when they approached their company employees to fix the glitch, they irresponsibly and indifferently. So in the past one year when I have been having various technical glitches and problems while using their mobile phone, I have no choice but to think that I have been cheated by your company and with great heartache. I didn't want to vent my frustration to the company staff by fighting. However last 09/09/24 Xiaomi 12 Pro | 5G suddenly appeared vertical lines. When I took it to their service centre to get it fixed, Xiaomi 12 Pro | The 5G display is currently out of stock and will be delayed, after a week they fixed the problem and sent it back. However on 19/09/24 Xiaomi 12 Pro | The 5G display turns black and becomes unusable. They gave it to their service centre to fix it and after 4 days they fixed the problem and returned it. Then on 27/09/24 Xiaomi 12 Pro | 5G suddenly has horizontal lines and creates an unusable environment. How can they deceive their customers with a mobile phone that is constantly experiencing technical problems? They had complained about this to their customer service centre staff on 27/09/24, but till date (16/10/24) no response or solution has been given. After 1 ½ years of buying the mobile, I have been to their service centre for product fault more than 5 times and it takes 5 to 7 days to get it back. Xiaomi 12 Pro | How can a mobile phone be used with confidence during travels and office work, when 5G is flashed and given to their service centre for troubleshooting and repeated use of the mobile phone causes various series of technical glitches and issues. So MI Xiaomi 12 Pro | 5G (Noir Black, 12GB RAM, 256GB Storage) | Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 | 50+50+50MP Flagship Cameras (OIS) | 10bit 2K+ Curved AMOLED Display | Sound by Harman Kardon | Mobile phone B09XB8RRMV (XI12PRO-BLK-12+256GB) to me at a cost of ₹ 59,999.00 (Fifty Nine Thousand Nine Hundred Nine Hundred) and an amount of ₹ 4,500.00 (Rupees Four Thousand Five Hundred) totalling ₹ 64,499.00 (Rupees Sixty Four Thousand Nine Hundred Nine). I humbly request you to provide refund my cash or ( ₹ 64,499.00 )Worth mobile for such amount.

Review Title: Fog/condensation in primary rear camera when record video 1080p 60 fps or 4k 30/60 fps & heats up
Review Comment:
I have ordered this phone on 10 oct 22 with exchange my old phone & recv 11 oct 22 .
mfg. - May 2022

Pros- Disply superb
Sound quaity superbb
Charging speed 0 to 100% in 20 miniute.superbb

Cons-When i turn on camera & record video after 2 to 3 miniute fog/ condensation appear in main primery rear camera...room ac tempreture 25c ..images & video blurr....when i stop recording  & close camera after 1 minute fog removes.. after that i try recoarding below fan speed full again fog appear ...& phone heats up quickly..
I call amazon customer care for replacement they said they appoint technician he visit at your home and check the phone issue and after that if technician said this issue then they accept replacement..
I said ok on schedule date and time technician not came & resechdule visit after 2 days..after 2 days technician  came & check the mobile camera Tecnician said your phone camera have fog appear issue when camera record video. He said he submit replacment request/ feedback.. i call amezon cuctomer care next day & ask replacment update but they reply the technician update status null/ resolved feedback..
But i tell issue not resolved they appoint again new technician visit..after 2 days nobody came or call me for visit & visit automatic resechdule after 2 days..i call again customer care ..& tell issue then they agree and arrange replacement request 16 oct.,
On 18 oct i have recv replacement phone ..mfg. Apr 2022
old phone pickup by delivery boy & deliver me replacement mobile ..
 But the replaced phone have the same issue so i again call customer care & raised a complaint.  19 oct  they  initiate return/refund request..pickup date showing 20 oct.. but 20 oct no call/ msg from amzn delivery boy.. i again call customer care they again raise return request on 22 oct..& finally on 22 oct pickup succesfully compleated by delivery boy.. it reached their seller warehose on 26 oct.. i  call customer care  & ask for refund amount they said after 3 working days (exclude saturday & sunday) on 1 nov you have recv amount in credit card & exchange phone amount  recev in amazon pay balance.. on 2 nov i have not recv refund amt then i call customer care ..they said they initiate refund request amount will be credited by 7 nov. In credit card & exchange phone amount credit in 2 days in amazon pay balance..
many days of contacting customer care and struggle i got the refund on 02 nov 2022.@ 11PM. in amazon pay 600 rs exchange phone amount (after deducting 13000 promotional exchange value)
& on 03 nov 2022 i got refund my rest amount(after deducting 100 rs exchange service charge) in credit card.

In this flagship phone i dont expect these kind of issue..

I think seller sells defective mfg Apr 2022 & May 2022 peices in diwali sale..

& Highly disappointed from technician visit service from amazon..

Review Title: "Jack of all; Master of none". Best suites for this smartphone.
Review Comment:
A good phone with great display and it ends there. Quad Speakers (claimed) are tuned but Harman; but definitely lacks quality and also sound is also less. Wirless audio is good.
Pros: 1. Awesome LTPO AMOLED 2k Display
2. Good wirless audio on headphones and earphones.
3. Good build.
4. 5G Ready
5. Charger is awesome. I was able to fully charge in 25 mins.
6. Haptic feedback is above average, if not the best.
Cons:
1. Poor quality audio on quad speakers.
2. Mediocre camera set up. Both videography and photography is poor.
3. No Macro photography for this price is a blummer ( it is there on redmi note 10 and not on flagship).
4. 2x Telephoto lens is literally useless. Niether portrait photos nor zooming capacity is hardly usable.
5. Miui is buggy and bloated, even after paying 68k, you'll have some 3rd party keyboard installed, which we can not uninstalled.
6. So many bloatware, for a flagship - Mi should have cleaned it up a bit.
7. Worst memory management, memory leak and frequent apps crashing.
8. Bugs on video apps. Example YouTube - vidoes just zooms in so much so that video is not visible at all. ( Not video zoom feature on YouTube). Even after restarting app, persists.
9. Was unable to install Hotstar app from playstore. Had to finally install it from outside in the web which is not safe. ( No internet issues on wifi and 4g mobile data).
10. Unavailability of accessories like. Tampered glass is so irritating. I got scratches in very 1st week on screen.
11. Heats up very very badly. I'm not able to hold it for 2 mins. Hands are also heated up. Even simple task of messaging heats up heavily. It's definately a deal breaker.
12. Battery drains very fast. Although topping up battery is very quick, a good respectable SOT is necessary. But drains very fast. Not a full day phone at all.
If I get anymore experience, will update this. Thanks.

Pros - Good build quality. Good camera! Battery life is good if used for day to day activities. Good connectivity over wifi

Drawbacks - Most important - This does Not have a truly curved screen! The screen is flat, covered by a curved glass!!! One can compare the flow of text on phones like oppo find x2 and iqoo 9 Pro and you will notice that on these phones the text and pictures bend to the sides when you scroll horizontally. But in this phone you can clearly see that it's a flat scroll!!!

Connectivity over mobile network is not good in closed rooms. While the Asus rog 5 and the Oppo find x2 show upto 4 bands on the network indicator this phone goes down to 2! -95 to -100 for the Asus and the Oppo while it's -115 to -119 for the Xiaomi! That's poor!

Has a good display - but not anywhere near the Oppo find x2 which is way brighter! Difficult to believe that this phone has a peak brightness of 1500 nits!

Even though this is on Android 12 the miui software is not as good as color os. Recent apps can't be swiped up like in other phones, they need to be swiped to the side!

Accessibility features for apps like Nova launcher etc keep getting disabled even if battery optimisation is turned off! Features like double tap to lock screen don't work, which is very bad!!!

There is no option to pick colours from the wallpaper or to change the colour accent of the icons etc, which is disappointing!

Finally one important point - the first phone which i received was faulty. It failed to detect the sim and used to heat up and force the user to wipe the data, and if not used to keep rebooting! Amazon replaced the phone, and the second piece is working normally. If anyone faces the same issue please inform Amazon immediately.

Bought this in Great Indian festival sale.
1.This is  lightning fast ⚡ mobile. Processing is very fast. You can click 30 photos in just 10secs. I have tried by keeping a timer beside.
2.Camera does good work. A bit disappointed with front camera. I was using redmi k20 since last 4 years which was having 16mp front camera but that was clicking much sharper pictures than this 32mp front camera.
3. I felt sound is a bit low. Sound could be louder. But harman kardon sound system does it's job, can be appreciated well with a headset.
Everything else  very good. No other issues
